**Action** - Destroy Aether Ironweave: Gain [2 Resource]. Activate this ability only if you have played an attack action card and a 'non-attack' action card this turn. **Go again**

**Battleworn** *(If you defend with Aether Ironweave, put a -1[Defense] counter on it when the combat chain closes.)*

Bounding Demigon (red).name: Bounding Demigon
Bounding Demigon (red).text:
If you have played a 'non-attack' action card this turn, you may play Bounding Demigon from your banished zone. If you do, it gains +1 [Power].

**Blood Debt** *(At the beginning of your end phase, if Bounding Demigon is in your banished zone, lose 1[Life].)*

Chane.name: Chane
Chane.text: **Once per Turn Action** - Create a Soul Shackle token: Your next Runeblade or Shadow action this turn gains **go again**. **Go again** *(It's an aura with "At the beginning of your action phase, banish the top card of your deck.")*

Halo of Illumination.name: Halo of Illumination
Halo of Illumination.text:
**Instant** - [1 Resource], destroy Halo of Illumination: Put a card from your hand into your hero's soul. If it's a Light card, draw a card. *(Put the card face up under your hero card.)*

**Spellvoid 2** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may destroy Halo of Illumination instead. If you do, prevent 2 arcane damage that source would deal.)*

artist.blurb:
Freelance, concept artist, illustrator - Saint Petersburg, Russia
Freelancer since 2013
artist.name: Nikolai Maslakov

Heartened Cross Strap.name: Heartened Cross Strap

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

The attack action card does not again go again. Heartened Cross Strap’s activated ability requires an action point to use and provides an action point from go again upon resolution.
The reduction does not carry over to any additional attack actions outside of the first attack action card you play after activating Heartened Cross Strap.

Heartened Cross Strap.text: **Action** - Destroy Heartened Cross Strap: The next attack action card you play this turn costs [2 resource] less to play. **Go again**

artist.blurb: Concept art, illustration - Penza, Russia (AKA Sasha Mokhov)
artist.name: Alexander Mokhov

Herald of Judgment.name: Herald of Judgment
Herald of Judgment.text:
**Prism Specialization** *(You may only have Herald of Judgment in your deck if your hero is Prism.)*

If Herald of Judgment hits, put it into your hero's soul and the defending hero can't play cards from their banished zone during their next action phase. *(Put this card face up under your hero card.)*

**Phantasm** *(If Herald of Judgment is defended by a non-Illusionist attack action card with 6 or more [Power], destroy Herald of Judgment and close the combat chain.)*

Iris of Reality.name: Iris of Reality

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.
LINKS:
Prints and more: 
https://www.artstation.com/bimawithpencil
Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/_bimawithpencil_
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bimawithpencil
NFT's: 
https://foundation.app/@bimawithpencil
artist.name: bimawithpencil

Lord Sutcliffe.name: Lord Sutcliffe
Lord Sutcliffe.text:
**Mentor** *(You may only have Sutcliffe in your deck if your hero is young.)*

At the start of your turn, if Sutcliffe is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

Whenever you play a 'non-attack' action card, deal 1 arcane damage to each hero and put a lesson counter on Sutcliffe for each damage dealt this way. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on Sutcliffe, banish him, search your deck a **specialization** card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Malang, Indonesia (AKA Immanuela Lesterina).
Hello! I am a freelance artist from Indonesia. I love to draw fantasy art in semi-realism style. Currently working on some personal commissions and commercial work.
artist.name: Immanuela Crovius

Lunartide Plunderer (yellow).name: Lunartide Plunderer
Lunartide Plunderer (yellow).text: If Lunartide Plunderer hits a hero, banish it and up to 1 card from their soul.

artist.blurb:
Hello! My name is Eleonor, I’m from Portugal, and I’m a freelance illustrator and concept character artist.
My weapons of choice are Photoshop and my old and trusty Bamboo Fun Tablet. And I work on Windows 10.
If you enjoy my art, or share my love for chocolate croissants, mountains, and space, please consider supporting what I do - so I can do more of it! Thank you!
artist.name: Eleonor Piteira

Merciful Retribution.name: Merciful Retribution
Merciful Retribution.text:
Whenever an aura or attack action card you control is destroyed, deal 1 arcane damage to target hero. If it's a non-token Light card, put it into your hero's soul. *(Put it face up under your hero card.)*

**Spectra** *(Merfiful Retribution can be attacked. When Merfiful Retribution becomes the target of an attack, destroy it and close the combat chain. The attack does not resolve.)*

Ode to Wrath.name: Ode to Wrath
Ode to Wrath.text:
Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opposing hero, they lose 1[Life].

Illusionist attack action cards you control have **go again**. *(If an attack is destroyed, go again does not resolve.)*

**Spectra** *(Ode to Wrath can be attacked. When Ode to Wrath becomes the target of an attack, destroy it and close the combat chain. The attack does not resolve.)*

Illusionist attack action cards you control have **go again**. *(If an attack is destroyed, go again does not resolve.)*

**Spectra** *(Ode to Wrath can be attacked. When Ode to Wrath becomes the target of an attack, destroy it and close the combat chain. The attack does not resolve.)*

artist.blurb:
Bima is an illustrator from Indonesia that has a passion for bringing a vision to canvas. He has done various projects from card game illustrations, concept art, to promotional art for Netflix. His motto is "Use whatever gets it done faster and better". In making his work, he uses multiple tools, from 2D digital paintings, 3D, and photos. All combined it produces a seamless, high quality result in the most effective and efficient way.
He has produced work for Legend Story Studios, White Wizard Games, Plaid Hat Games, and more.

**Go again**

artist.blurb:
Freelance Illustrator - Santiago, Chile
Chile-based illustrator, focused mainly on fantasy related projects, with experience in producing illustrations for TCG, RPG and tabletop games.
Fantasy illustrator with a background in traditional visual arts with over 6 years of experience in the tabletop gaming industry. 

My work has mainly revolved around fantasy and sci-fi related projects, including role playing games, trading card games and boardgames. I have had the pleasure to work for both big publishers and private commisisoners as a freelancer. Currently working for Legend Story Studios, Onyx Path Publishing, Attack Wagon and Borealis Games, among others,

​My main interests right now lie in the exploration of the imaginative and otherworldy, connecting it to the fantastical and the surreal. Also, my inspirations range from the classical, baroque and romantic artists to modern fantasy and concept art, going through music, literature, mythology and popular culture as well.
artist.name: Marco Gonzàlez

Snapdragon Scalers.name: Snapdragon Scalers

rulings.description:
When an action with go again resolves, its controller gains 1 action point.
Multiple instances of go again on the same card or activated ability do not stack. If a card or activated ability has multiple instances of go again when it resolves its controller gains 1 action point only.

If this is used on an attack with go again, you will only gain 1 action point upon resolution as multiple instances of *go againdo not stack.
Snapdragon Scaler’s activated ability is an attack reaction. You may activate it during the reaction window when you are the attacking hero.

Snapdragon Scalers.text: **Attack reaction** - Destroy Snapdragon Scalers: Target attack action card with cost [resource] or less gains **go again**.

Soul Reaping.name: Soul Reaping
Soul Reaping.text:
**Legendary Chane Specialization** *(You may only have 1 Soul Reaping in your deck and only if your hero is Chane.)*

You may banish 1 or more cards from your hand rather than pay Soul Reaping's [Resource] cost. If you do, gain [1 Resource] for each card with **blood debt** banished this way.

While Soul Reaping is attacking a hero with 1 or more cards in their soul, it has **go again**.

The Librarian.name: The Librarian
The Librarian.text:
**Mentor** *(You may only have The Librarian in your deck if your hero is young.)*

At the start of your turn, if The Librarian is face down in your arsenal, you may turn him face up.

**Once per Turn Effect** - Whenever you create a Spectral Shield token, draw a card and put a lesson counter on The Librarian. Then if there are 3 or more lesson counters on The Librarian, banish him, search your deck a **specialization** card, put it face up into your arsenal, and shuffle your deck.
